snippet: The California Public Utilities Commission said today that a rate increase for consumers was likely and that over the next weeks it would inspect the books of the two major utilities to decide how much was reasonable.    The move is an effort in p...
lead_paragraph: The California Public Utilities Commission said today that a rate increase for consumers was likely and that over the next weeks it would inspect the books of the two major utilities to decide how much was reasonable. The move is an effort in part to show Wall Street that California is committed to ensuring the health of the state's utilities.
abstract: California Public Utilities Commission says that rate increase is likely and that over next weeks it will inspect books of two major utilities to decide how much is reasonable (M)

headline.main: Trying to Shore Up Utilities, California Plans Rate Increase
